TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件取消按钮时单击，但在退出前插入或编辑模式。The control raises the event when the Cancel button is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode. (取消按钮是的按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"取消") 这使你能够在每次此事件发生时，例如停止取消操作，如果它会将项放入不需要执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法状态。(A Cancel button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Cancel") This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. A对象传递给事件处理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此对象可用于确定包含引发事件的取消按钮的项的索引。This object enables you to determine the index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event. 您还可以确定哪些操作已取消。You can also determine what operation was canceled. 若要停止取消操作，请设置属性`true`。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象显示一条消息，当用户取消中的 insert 或 update 操作控件。The following example shows how to use the object to display a message when the user cancels the insert or update operation in a control. 对象传递到事件处理方法事件。The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 itemIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelMode cancelMode) cil managed
Public Sub New (itemIndex As Integer, cancelMode As ListViewCancelMode)

param.name: itemIndex
param.span: 项的索引，该项包含引发事件的“取消”按钮。

span.span: The index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

param.name: cancelMode
param.span: 值之一，表示用户取消了何种操作。

span.span: One of the values that indicates which operation the user canceled.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cancelMode` 参数的值。The value of the `cancelMode` parameter.| ||`itemIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `itemIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，是主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CancelMode As ListViewCancelMode

summary.span: 获取单击“取消”按钮时 控件所处的数据输入模式。

span.span: Gets the data-entry mode that the control was in when the Cancel button was clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否控件处于编辑模式或取消按钮被单击时插入模式。Use the property to determine whether the control was in edit or insert mode when the Cancel button was clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定数据输入模式的控件时在用户单击取消按钮。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the data-entry mode that the control was in when the user clicked the Cancel button. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemIndex As Integer
public: property int ItemIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取项的索引，该项包含引发事件的“取消”按钮。

span.span: Gets the index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

value.span: 包含引发事件的“取消”按钮的项从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用户单击属性以确定包含取消按钮的项的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the item that contains the Cancel button clicked by the user. 通常用于检索的项的项索引集合控件，使您能够访问项目的属性。The item index is often used to retrieve the item from the collection of the control, which enables you to access the item's properties. 当属性设置为`ListViewCancelMode.CancelingInsert`的值属性始终为-1。When the property is set to `ListViewCancelMode.CancelingInsert`, the value of the property is always -1. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定包含用户单击取消按钮的编辑项的索引。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the index of the edit item that contains the Cancel button that was clicked by the user. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#2)]
